Source code for pyxalign.style.text

class text_colors:
    HEADER = "\033[95m"
    OKBLUE = "\033[94m"
    OKCYAN = "\033[96m"
    OKGREEN = "\033[92m"
    WARNING = "\033[93m"
    FAIL = "\033[91m"
    ENDC = "\033[0m"
    BOLD = "\033[1m"
    UNDERLINE = "\033[4m"




[docs]
def ordinal(n: int):
    if 11 <= (n % 100) <= 13:
        suffix = "th"
    else:
        suffix = ["th", "st", "nd", "rd", "th"][min(n % 10, 4)]
    return str(n) + suffix
